Package shared.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Building
    Class that holds information about Game Pieces These are Settlements or Cities and not Roads They have a color to link them to their player They have a location on a vertex of the map These attributes cannot be changed once set
    DevCardList
    A collection of development cards
    Edge
    Class That represents the edges of the map (where you can build roads) The location and direction cannot change after setup Once a road is built on the edge it never changes
    Fascade
    The Facade class handles all communication and commands to and from the game model.
    Game
    The Catan Game all collected is represented in this class This is the model's main container
    GameMap
    The class that represents the map of the game.
    MessageLine
    Message line has a message and a source.
    MessageList
    A container for all messages in the game.
    NumberChit
    A class that holds the number assigned to each terrain hex.
    Player
    Michael Rhodes CS 340 Section 2 Dr.
    Port
    This class represents a Port Ports have a vertex location on the map Ports have a type depending on what you can trade with them Ports cannot change location or type after the map is generated
    ResourceCard  
    ResourceList
    Indicates a list of resources .This is often used to show posessions from player in hand or costs.
    Road
    The Road is always on an Edge The road is located on a border between hex locations.
    Robber
    Class representing the Robber.
    TerrainHex
    The TerrainHex class represents a hexagonal map section It will have a NumberChit unless it is of type DESERT Its location, number and type do not change during the game.
    TradeOffer
    The trade offer currently on the table.
    TurnTracker
    Keeps track of whose turn it is and where they are at in their turn.
    Vertex
    The vertex class represents the corners of the terrain hexes where a building may be built or a port may exist.
